sentences.en: What was truly despicable was the deafening silence maintained by the candidates concerning the riots.
sentences.cn: 真正可鄙的是这些侯选人对暴乱所持的缄默态度。

sentences.en: The minister, who visited the scene a few hours after the explosion, said it was a despicable crime.
sentences.cn: 部长在爆炸发生后几小时视察现场后说，这是一桩可鄙的罪行。
